16  package org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.configuration.infinispan.cache.container.scattered.cache.store.custom;
17  
18  import org.jboss.arquillian.core.api.annotation.Inject;
19  import org.jboss.arquillian.graphene.page.Page;
20  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.Console;
21  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.CrudOperations;
22  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.Random;
23  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyContainer;
24  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fragment.FormFragment;
25  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.model.ResourceVerifier;
26  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.page.configuration.ScatteredCachePage;
27  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.Manatoko;
28  import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
29  import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
30  import org.junit.jupiter.api.Disabled;
31  import org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer;
32  import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
33  import org.junit.jupiter.api.TestMethodOrder;
34  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Container;
35  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Testcontainers;
36  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.OnlineManagementClient;
37  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Operations;
38  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Values;
39  
40  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.ALLOW_RESOURCE_SERVICE_RESTART;
41  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.CLASS;
42  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.JGROUPS;
43  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.TRANSPORT;
44  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyConfiguration.FULL_HA;
45  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.BEHIND;
46  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.THROUGH;
47  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.WRITE;
48  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.cacheContainerAddress;
49  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.customStoreAddress;
50  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.scatteredCacheAddress;
51  
52  @Manatoko
53  @Testcontainers
54  @TestMethodOrder(MethodOrderer.MethodName.class)
55  @Disabled // TODO Fix failing tests
56  class WriteBehaviourTest {
57  
58      private static final String CACHE_CONTAINER = "cache-container-" + Random.name();
59      private static final String SCATTERED_CACHE = "scattered-cache-" + Random.name();
60      @Container static WildFlyContainer wildFly = WildFlyContainer.standalone(FULL_HA);
61      private static OnlineManagementClient client;
62  
63      @BeforeAll
64      static void setupModel() throws Exception {
65          client = wildFly.managementClient();
66          Operations operations = new Operations(client);
67          operations.add(cacheContainerAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER));
68          operations.add(cacheContainerAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER).and(TRANSPORT, JGROUPS));
69          operations.add(scatteredCacheAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE));
70  
71          operations.headers(Values.of(ALLOW_RESOURCE_SERVICE_RESTART, true))
72                  .add(customStoreAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE), Values.of(CLASS, Random.name()));
73      }
74  
75      @Inject CrudOperations crud;
76      @Inject Console console;
77      @Page ScatteredCachePage page;
78      FormFragment form;
79  
80      @BeforeEach
81      void prepare() {
82          page.navigate(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE);
83          console.waitNoNotification();
84          console.verticalNavigation().selectPrimary("scattered-cache-store-item");
85          page.getCustomStoreTab().select(ScatteredCachePage.CUSTOM_STORE_WRITE_BEHAVIOUR_TAB);
86          form = page.getCustomStoreWriteBehindForm();
87      }
88  
89      @Test
90      void change1ToWriteBehind() throws Exception {
91          console.waitNoNotification();
92          page.switchBehaviour();
93          new ResourceVerifier(customStoreAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE).and(WRITE, BEHIND),
94                  client).verifyExists();
95      }
96  
97      @Test
98      void change2ModificationQueueSize() throws Exception {
99          console.waitNoNotification();
100         crud.update(customStoreAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE).and(WRITE, BEHIND), form,
101                 "modification-queue-size", Random.number());
102     }
103 
104     @Test
105     void change3ThreadPoolSize() throws Exception {
106         console.waitNoNotification();
107         crud.update(customStoreAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE).and(WRITE, BEHIND), form,
108                 "thread-pool-size", Random.number());
109     }
110 
111     @Test
112     void change4ToWriteThrough() throws Exception {
113         console.waitNoNotification();
114         page.switchBehaviour();
115         new ResourceVerifier(customStoreAddress(CACHE_CONTAINER, SCATTERED_CACHE).and(WRITE, THROUGH),
116                 client).verifyExists();
117     }
118 }
